message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds a significant value to us, reflecting its high quality and unique features. Given its worth to us, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12000. We believe this offer strikes a balance between fairness and profitability, allowing you to benefit from its value while ensuring we receive a fair return for our investment. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of working together.
